thread.title: Evolution Event Solutions Promotes One, Grows Team by Two

author: cnbc.com
title: Evolution Event Solutions Promotes One, Grows Team by Two
text:
NASHVILLE, Tenn.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Evolution Event Solutions (EES), a strategic meeting management and event production company serving corporations and non-profit entities, recently promoted Megan Manchester to director of sales, and added two new team members, Madisen Gentry and Julie Ann Redus, to support its growing business.
Manchester most recently served as operations coordinator, where she has proven her ability to develop meaningful client relationships. She has worked closely with organizations of all types to develop results-oriented experiences. As director of sales, she will focus on client engagement and business development.
“Megan has been an all-star player since day one, helping our clients execute creative, high-touch experiences,” said Falon Veit Scott, EES CEO. “We are thrilled to have her move into this role, connecting businesses with proven event management solutions that engage their audiences and achieve their business objectives.”
Gentry joins EES as operations coordinator. She graduated from Western Kentucky University with a degree in communications and event planning. Gentry previously worked in retail management, gaining experience in marketing, business operations and event management. For EES, she will oversee vendor management and event production, as well as assist with business relationships and client communication.
EES also added Redus in the new role of sales coordinator. With a diverse background in occupational therapy and college athletics, she has honed her skills in team building, budgeting and planning. Redus will help establish successful business relationships by supporting outreach and development to both new and existing clients.
“We love adding bright, creative thinkers to our team, and Madisen and Julie Ann both bring enthusiasm to EES,” Scott said. “I am excited to see their ideas and ambition in action.”
About Evolution Event Solutions
Evolution Event Solutions is a strategic meeting management and event production company serving corporations and non-profit entities nationally and around the world. Headquartered in Nashville, Tennessee, and with offices in North Carolina and Florida, EES provides strategic meeting and sponsorship management, event production, and non-profit services to companies globally. EES is a member of the Certified Women’s Business Enterprise (WBENC), Nashville Chamber of Commerce, International Airlines Travel Agent Network (IATAN), Event & Meeting Planning Networking and Education (MPI), Rotary International and the International Live Events Association. For more information, visit www.evolutioneventsolutions.com .
